headline: Agoda Unveils Goa and Dubai as Top Choices for Republic Day Long Weekend Escapes
summary: With the Republic Day holiday falling alongside a weekend in 2026, Indian travellers were already planning their next break after the recent Christmas and New Year period. Agoda data shows that accommodation searches for the Republic Day window of January 23–26 are higher than last year, with domestic searches up by 115% year-on-year and outbound searches rising by 63%. Goa leads domestic search interest, while Dubai tops international destinations, suggesting travellers were looking to make the
